entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
